SERVICES.LANGUAGE:
<TEXT Value="Priest: In the morning, hearken unto my voice, O my king and God.
Choir: [Sticheron Melody] Tone 6: In the morning, hearken unto my voice,//O my king and God. (Prostration)
Priest: Unto my words give ear, O Lord, hear my cry.
Choir: In the morning, hearken unto my voice, //O my king and God.(Prostration)
Priest: For unto Thee will I pray, O Lord.
Choir: In the morning, hearken unto my voice,// O my king and God.(Prostration)
"/>
